mech.mania.StarterPack

Class Strategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • mech.mania.StarterPack.Strategy

  • public class Strategy
extends java.lang.Object
    A class where contestants will implement their strategy for the MechMania25 Hackathon.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Strategy(mech.mania.StarterPack.GameInit init)
      This constructor is called when a game is first started.
      Strategy(GameState state)
      This constructor is called if/when the server restarts in the middle of a game

    • Constructor Detail

      • Strategy

        public Strategy(mech.mania.StarterPack.GameInit init)
        This constructor is called when a game is first started.
        Parameters:
        init - The initial state of this new game
        See Also:

      • Strategy

        public Strategy(GameState state)
        This constructor is called if/when the server restarts in the middle of a game
        Parameters:
        state - the current state of the game
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getSetup

        public UnitSetup[] getSetup(int playerNum)
        Method to set unit initializations. Run at the beginning of a game, after assigning player numbers.
        Returns:
        An array of UnitSetup objects which define attack pattern, terrain creation pattern, health, and speed.
        See Also:
        UnitSetup

      • doTurn

        public Decision[] doTurn(GameState gameState)
        Method to implement the competitors strategy in the next turn of the game. This is where competitors should be putting most of their code.
        Parameters:
        gameState - An object recording the current state of the game.
        Returns:
        An object representing the actions to execute this turn. Includes the movement and attack directions for each unit and the priorities (order) in which to execute them.
        See Also:
        Decision
